issues.message: ['Incorporation of Y-27632 during stage two (D4–D7) to improve cell survival during posterior intermediate mesoderm differentiation from primitive streak.'] is not of type 'object'
['Add Y-27632 and activin A to culture during stage two (D4–D7).'] is not of type 'object'
['Replace original 10 ng ml⁻¹ FGF with 50 ng ml⁻¹ FGF9 during stage three for improved SIX2+/PAX2+ iNPC induction efficiency.'] is not of type 'object'
['FACS analysis at end of stage three shows 30–50% SIX2+ and 10–20% SIX2+/PAX2+ cells.'] is not of type 'object'
['FACS-purify SIX2+/PAX2+ iNPCs and culture in hNPSR-v2 medium for expansion.'] is not of type 'object'
['hNPSR-v2 medium contains: human LIF (replaces mouse LIF), FGF2, BMP7, CHIR99021 (1.5 µM), Y-27632, heparin, A83-01, LDN193189, SB202190, DAPT, and TRULI.'] is not of type 'object'
['hNPSR-v1 medium supports NPC identity for only 2 weeks; hNPSR-v2 with TRULI enables long-term expansion (>months).'] is not of type 'object'
['Dissociate long-term expanded iNPCs into single cells and reaggregate in 96-well low-attachment U-bottom plates.'] is not of type 'object'
['Transfer iNPC aggregates to Transwell at air–liquid interface for nephron organoid differentiation.'] is not of type 'object'
['Add CHIR99021 to mimic WNT9b signal and initiate mesenchymal-to-epithelial transition (MET).'] is not of type 'object'
['On day 5, transition from APEL2 basal medium to advanced RPMI 1640 medium to support organoid structural integrity.'] is not of type 'object'
['Supplement A83-01 to enhance organoid maturity, observed via collagen markers in podocytes and megalin in proximal tubules.'] is not of type 'object'
['Major nephron segments form within 2 weeks; increased maturity observed after 3 weeks of differentiation.'] is not of type 'object'
